subjectArea.name: CX - Opportunity Revenue Line Snapshot
subjectArea.description: The data is sourced from CX Sales and this subject area enables you to track and report on historical Opportunity Revenue Line data and Opportunity transitions in the context of key business objects such as Customer/Account, Opportunity, Opportunity Owner, Opportunity Sales Stage, Product, and Partner.
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot
